bibl.title: P. Michigan XIX. Baptized for Our Sakes: A Leather Trisagion from Egypt (P. Mich. 799).
bibl.note: 3 pll. et 1 pl. dépl. h. t.
P. Mich. XIX, 799. Leather, 23,3 x 38,5 cm. Provenance unknown, 7th century.
bibl.seg: MARTINEZ David G. (Edition and Commentary by), P. Michigan XIX. Baptized for Our Sakes: A Leather Trisagion from Egypt (P. Mich. 799). (Beiträge zur Altertumskunde. 120.)
Stuttgart - Leipzig, B.G. Teubner, 1999, 8°, xi-115 pp., 3 pll. et 1 pl. dépl. h. t. ISBN 3-519-07669-1.
P. Mich. XIX, 799. Leather, 23,3 x 38,5 cm. Provenance unknown, 7th century.

C.R. par Heinzgerd Brakmann, OC 84 (2000) pp. 264-266. - James G. Keenan, CR N.S., 50 (2000) pp. 634-635. - Cornelia Römer, ChrEg 75 (2000) No. 150, pp. 352-354. - Jutta Henner, Biblos 50 (2001) pp. 370-372.
